mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TYPE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TYPE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TYPE ) VALUES ( ( SELECT #{userType} ||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') ||DECODE(LPAD(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEMBER_IDX, -3)))+1, 3, 0), null, '001', LPAD(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEMBER_IDX, -3)))+1, 3, 0)) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_IDX LIKE '%'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'%' ), #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userEmail}, #{userType} )
